    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    PropertyPlaceholderHelper.replacePlaceholders(String value, PropertyPlaceholderHelper.PlaceholderResolver placeholderResolver)
    Replace all placeholders of format ${name} with the value returned from the supplied PropertyPlaceholderHelper.PlaceholderResolver.
